back_flavor: Chiaki Asami lived with his parents in an unstable country on the brink of rebellion. Just a child, he was forced to watch as the ensuing chaos stole his family from him. Forming a small group with refugees including Akira Hojo, he attempted flee the country. Only the two of them had survived by the time they reached the new world of Arkham. Chiaki was disgusted by the state of society when he saw the broken city. He vowed to take the political reins of Arkham and steer it towards a brighter future. Criminals, the corrupt, or even the abyss itself be damned.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Spirit and Insight cards level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Referendum, On Borrowed Time, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Chiaki Asami
text: Your cards with the Favor trait gain the Insight trait. At the start of the round, flip all of your Policy cards to their Pending side. Flip your Policy card that has been on its Pending side the longest to its Enacted side. [elder_sign] effect: +1. After this test ends, you may flip 1 of your Policy cards to its Enacted side.

name: Push for Progress
text: Chiaki Asami deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. Max 1 per round. Flip 1 your policy cards to its Pending side, then unexhaust it. You may spend 1 resource. Flip 1 your policy cards to its Enacted side (2 if you spent a resource this way).

name: On Borrowed Time
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation Secretly add this card to your hand. Forced At the end of your turn: Take X damage, where X is the number of actions you spent this round. If another investigator is at your location, take 1 direct horror. Discard On Borrowed Time.

name: depricated (Sleepless Nights)
text: Revelation - If Foresight has less than 3 supplies; shuffle Sleepless Nights into your deck. Otherwise, put Sleepless Nights into play in your threat area. Foresight's "[free]" ability can only be used once per round. At the end of your turn: take 1 horror damage for each supply on Foresight (Max 2 horror). If Foresight has no supplies on it discard this card.

back_flavor: Jack had always had a knack for getting people what they needed, and for a low enough price to raise eyebrows. As he moved from job to job, he found that he could help people who were in too deep, but only if he was willing to take on the burden himself. His debt grew with each person he saved, and so did the shadiness of his activities. Eventually, he found the police knocking on his door, so he fled into the depths of Arkham. These days, Jack can be found in dark alleys, making deals that the police could hardly imagine, to pay off his most recent debt.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, and Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Family Bonds, Prying Eyes, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Jack Myers
text:
Handlocked.
[reaction] When you play the left most card in your hand: Reduce the cost of that card by 1 for every 3 other cards in your hand (Limit once per round).
[elder_sign] effect: +1, if you succeed; draw a card and you may move a card in your hand up to 3 positions to the left or right.

name: Family Bonds
text:
Fast. Max twice per round. Jack Myer Deck only.

Family Bonds does not count towards your maximum hand size. Ignore Family Bonds when determining the leftmost card in your hand.
Move a non-weakness card in your hand up to 2 positions to the left or right. Draw a card. Shuffle this card into your deck

name: Prying Eyes
text: Cannot be discarded. While Prying Eyes is in your hand: You can only play the 2 leftmost cards in your hand. Your cards lose and cannot gain fast. Forced At the end of your turn: move Prying Eyes one position to the left.

back_flavor: Akira Hojo lived with his father who worked as a doctor in a dangerously unstable country. When the chaos erupted, it toke everything from him. He gathered together other suffering children to survive. With Chiaki Asami and few others, he fled the country. Only he and Chiaki managed to survive the journey. When he reached the safety of Arkham, he was met with by a dark, warped city. He decided he would reform the criminal underbelly of Arkham. He vowed to turn these gangsters into a force that could protect Arkham from the anything, be it man or monster.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-3, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0. Neutral cards level 0-5. For every 12 experience you've earned in total, increase the level of Rogue cards you can take by 1 (max level 3) Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 Burning Ambition, 1 Occupational Hazard, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Akira Hojo
text: [reaction] When you perform a Fight action, spend 1 resource: Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed by 1 or more, you gain 1 resource (Limit once per test). [elder_sign] effect: +1. If this skill test causes an enemy to be defeated; gain 3 resources.

flavor:
"Why did you become a gangster?"
"Because you can do in a single day..."
name: Burning Ambition
text: Akira Hojo deck only. Fast. Uses (0 supplies). [reaction] After you use Akira Hojo's [reaction] ability, place 1 supply on Burning Ambition. Forced When there are at least 6 supplies on Burning Ambition: Search your bonded cards for Rite of Passage and swap it with Burning Ambition.

flavor: "...What it takes an ordinary man thirty years to do."
name: Rite of Passage
text: Bonded (Burning Ambition). Permanent. You get +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you succeed a skill test by 3 or more, exhaust Rite of Passage: Play an event card from your hand (paying its cost).

name: Occupational Hazard
text: Revelation Put Occupational Hazard into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn take 1 damage. If an ally is defeated this way, take 2 horror and discard Occupational Hazard.

back_flavor: The people around Alma always met gruesome fates. As an orphan, whenever she got close to others, they would suffer. As she grew older, she realized that she was the source of their misfortune, and their deaths. Distraught, she wandered into the depths of Arkham, and there she found them. People who didn't care that she was a cursed existence, because they were already doomed. She stood up for these hapless souls. Wouldn't let anyone look down on them. Her compassion earned her their loyalty, and the vow to find the source of their damnation until their final breath.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Non-Unique Ally cards level 0-5, Ally and Acquaintance cards 0-1, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 5 other Guardian ([guardian]) cards level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 Vagrant Messenger, Inevitable Fate, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Alma Venandi
text: You have an additional ally slot that can only be used to hold non-unique allies. Investigators at your location and connecting locations may use your Ally and Acquaintance assets to: Assign damage and/or horror. Use [action], [free], and [reaction] abilities as if they controlled it. (An ability may only be used by 1 investigator per round. [elder_sign] effect: +1. You may return an Ally asset from your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: "While the city quietly left us to die, she kept us going. We will do our part to end this damnation.
name: Vagrant Messenger
text:
Limit 1 per investigator. Alma Venandi deck only.

Enemies at your location have -1 evade.
[free] Exhaust Vagrant Messenger and deal 1 damage to it: Move to Alma Venandi's location.

flavor: "It's happening again. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry."
name: Inevitable Fate
text: Revelation Place Inevitable Fate into play in your threat area. It costs Investigators an additional action to leave your location. [action] Discard an Ally asset controled by Alma Venandi: Discard Inevitable Fate.

back_flavor: During every age, terrors would try to invade the world. While most of humanity remained unaware, William was there, holding the final line between the world and the forces outside it's understanding. From place to place, age to age, whenever the tides of madness began, he was there, waiting. Sometimes, he wonders if he holds back the chaos, or if his birth marks the start of the apocalypse.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: [[Relic]] cards level 0-5. Mystic cards ([Mystic]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 other level 0 seeker cards ([Seeker]). Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Future Foretold, Star Spawn, 1 random basic weakness. Additional Setup: You begin each game with Future Foretold as an additional card in your opening hand. Bonus Experience: Reduce the total experience cost of non-permanent exceptional cards you purchase by 2.

text: (?<![Pp]ermanent\. .*)Exceptional\.(?!.* [Pp]ermanent\.)

name: William Grindel
text: [reaction] Forced After you draw the last card in your deck and you have at least 7 cards in your prophecy deck: Move the cards from the prophecy deck to your deck. Draw 1 card. [reaction] When you reveal a token with a non-negative modifier during a skill test: Add your [elder_sign] token's effect to that token for this test. (Limit once per round). [elder_sign] effect: +2, reveal another token If you succeed, draw 1 card. After this skill test ends, you may move up to 3 cards from the top of your deck to the bottom of your prophecy deck.

flavor: "For in that moment, we shall be as gods."
name: Future Foretold
text:
William Grindel's deck only. Fast. Play at the start of the investigation phase.
Until the end of the phase, increase the modifier of chaos tokens drawn at your location with a negative modifier by 2. Place Future Foretold on top of your prophecy deck.

name: Star Spawn
text: Location farthest from all investigators. Hunter. After an investigator reveals an [eldersign] or [auto_fail] symbol during a skill test and Star Spawn is ready: Star Spawn attacks them (regardless of their location). Forced After Star Spawn is defeated, place it on top of your prophecy deck, under Future Foretold if it is the top card.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, event cards that say "investigate" or "discover" level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Photo Album, 3 copies of A Sight to See, A World Of Solitude, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Setup You begin each game with 3 copies of A Sight to See set aside, out of play.

text: [Ii]nvestigate
[Dd]iscover

flavor: There is a whole world out there waiting to be discovered.
name: Elise Collins
text:
[reaction] When you draw a non-weakness card from your deck, before resolving any of its effects, discard it: Add one of your set-aside A Sight to See events to your hand (limit once per round).
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may discard a copy of A Sight to See from your hand, then draw 2 cards.

name: A Sight to See
text: Investigate. If you succeed, discover a clue at a connecting location. Forced When A Sight to See would be discarded: Set it aside, out of play, instead.

name: Photo Album
text:
Elise Collnis deck only.

A Sight to See does not count towards your maximum hand size.

[reaction] When you play A Sight to See, exhaust Photo Album: Change "discover a clue at" to "move to".

name: A World Of Solitude
text: Revelation Put this card into play in your threat area. Attach all set aside copies of A Sight to See to this card. Discard all other copies of A Sight to See from your hand and in play. Forced At the end of your turn discard 1 attached copy of a A Sight to See and take 1 horror. It there are no cards attached to A World Of Solitude, discard it.

name: Lily McBride
text: XXXX

back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Spirit cards level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): "Drinks on me!", Alone in the World, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Amelia Barrett
text: Investigators at your location can play events beneath this card. [reaction] After an investigator or Ally asset your location is dealt damage or horror and there are less than 2 cards beneath this card: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may place 1 revealed Spirit event beneath this card. Shuffle the rest into your deck. (Limit once per round.) [eldersign] +1. You may shuffle a Spirit event from your discard into your deck.

name: "Drinks on me!"
text: Amelia Barrett deck only. For the remainder of the round, healing from player card effects may be disturbed from among investigators and/or Ally assets at the investigator's location. Heal 2 damage and 2 horror. You may take 1 horror, then draw 1 card.

name: Alone in the World
text: Revelation For each Spirit event in your hand, either take 1 horror or discard it. Then, if you have no Spirit events in hand, discard the top 6 cards of your deck. Draw each weaknesses discarded this way.

name: All Cards
text: text
